title: Seasons & Events
description: Test your knowledge of Fortnite's epic seasons and live events!

questions.question: Which season introduced the Battle Pass system?
questions.explanation: The Battle Pass was introduced in Season 2 with the knight-themed skins like the Black Knight!

questions.question: The Fortnite Chapter 2 map was completely different from Chapter 1.
questions.explanation: Chapter 2 introduced an entirely new island with fresh locations after The End event destroyed the Chapter 1 map!

questions.question: What was the name of the event where a rocket launched from the villain's lair?
questions.explanation: The Blast Off event in Season 4 was Fortnite's first major live event, featuring a rocket that cracked the sky!

questions.question: Which popular artist had a virtual concert in Fortnite in 2020?
questions.explanation: Travis Scott's Astronomical concert in April 2020 had over 12 million concurrent players!

questions.question: Marvel superheroes have appeared in Fortnite.
questions.explanation: Fortnite has featured many Marvel heroes including Iron Man, Thor, Wolverine, Spider-Man, and many more through various crossover seasons!

questions.question: What happened during 'The End' event at the conclusion of Chapter 1?

options.text: A black hole consumed the map

questions.explanation: The End event featured a black hole that consumed the entire map, leaving players staring at it for two days before Chapter 2 launched!

questions.question: Which season first introduced vehicles to Battle Royale?
questions.explanation: Shopping Carts were introduced in Season 4, making them Fortnite's first vehicle! The ATK (All Terrain Kart) came later in Season 5.

questions.question: Fortnite has had crossovers with Star Wars.
questions.explanation: Fortnite has featured multiple Star Wars crossovers with skins like Darth Vader, Luke Skywalker, and even premiered exclusive movie footage!
